name: Cccccliris
greetingText: I really fell in love with you
wishText: May your next page will be even brighter ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Even though this is the 3rd greeting you got from me hahaha.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Please come back to my hug asap if you would like to give me a chance.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
